tc=int(raw_input().strip())
for i in range(tc):
    n,q=map(int,(raw_input().strip()).split())
    l=[]
    for j in range(n):
        lis=map(int,(raw_input().strip()).split())
        l+=[lis]
    l.sort()
    for j in range(q):
        k=int(raw_input().strip())
        flag=0
        for p in range(n):
            if(l[p][0]<=k<=l[p][1]):
                flag=1
                break
        if(flag==1):
            print "NO"
        else:
            print "YES"
